Class EasyHangmanGame

java.lang.Object
  EasyHangmanGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
HangmanGame
public class EasyHangmanGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements HangmanGame

Basic hangman game. The game chooses a word, allows the user to guess letters in the chosen word.

Author:
Zach Souser

pattern

public java.lang.String pattern()
Returns the pattern to be shown to the user. If a letter is guessed, it is shown. If not, a dash is shown.

Specified by:
